title: Ep45 Identity Theft
description: This week, the gals gain a new paranoia while discussing the many ways in which your identity can be stolen. Topics include a douchey Frenchman, some major high school FOMO, and why you should always pay attention to the card reader at the gas pump. Paired with this episode is Winc's Porter and Plot Dolcetto, so sign up for LifeLock, look over those bank statements, and tune in for Identity Theft. This episode is supported by Sudio Sweden! Use our promo code ‘GALS’ for 15% OFF your order and FREE INTL SHIPPING at www.sudiosweden.com
